code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import logo from'../assets/LOGO.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const[roomId,setRoomId]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const createRoom=()=>{const id=Math.random().toString(36).substring(2,8);navigate(`/room/${id}`);};const joinRoom=()=>{if(roomId.trim()){navigate(`/room/${roomId}`);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundImage:`url('/background.jpg')`,backgroundSize:'cover',height:'100vh',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Ve Meet Logo",style:{width:200,marginBottom:40}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:createRoom,children:"Create Room"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Enter Room ID",value:roomId,onChange:e=>setRoomId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:joinRoom,children:"Join Room"})]});}
